# Hand of the Mage
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 2nd

**Slot** neck

**Price** 900 gp

**Weight** 2 lbs.

**Description**

This mummified elf hand hangs by a golden chain around a characterâ€™s neck (taking up space as a magic necklace would). It allows the wearer to utilize the spell *[[Mage Hand (Spell)|mage hand]]* at will.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Mage Hand (Spell)|mage hand]]*

**Cost** 450 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 516
